shapes

Class ShapeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.ShapeFactory

  • public class ShapeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing a mapping of all ShapeBuilders and variations of builders. Allows for abstract handling of Shape creation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShapeFactory()
      Creates a new ShapeFactory and adds all builders to it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ShapeBuilder getBuilder(java.lang.String shape, java.lang.String variation)
      Gets the builder for the given Shape name and variation name.
      ReadOnlyIterator<ShapeBuilder> getBuilders(java.lang.String shape)
      Gets an iterator of all builder variations for a given Shape name.
      int getNumShapes()
      Gets the number of Shape names mapped by this factory.
      int getNumVariations(java.lang.String shape)
      Gets the number of builder variations mapped by this factory for the given Shape name.
      ReadOnlyIterator<java.lang.String> getShapes()
      Gets an iterator of all the Shape names in this factory.
      protected void registerBuilder(ShapeBuilder builder)
      Adds a ShapeBuilder to this factory's mapping for later access.
      protected void registerBuilders()
      Registers all ShapeBuilders to this factory.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShapeFactory

        public ShapeFactory()
        Creates a new ShapeFactory and adds all builders to it.

    • Method Detail

      • registerBuilders

        protected void registerBuilders()
        Registers all ShapeBuilders to this factory. New Shapes would need to have their builders added here so that they can be constructed through this factory and set of builders.

      • registerBuilder

        protected void registerBuilder(ShapeBuilder builder)
        Adds a ShapeBuilder to this factory's mapping for later access.
        Parameters:
        builder - The ShapeBuilder to add.

      • getBuilders

        public ReadOnlyIterator<ShapeBuilder> getBuilders(java.lang.String shape)
        Gets an iterator of all builder variations for a given Shape name.
        Parameters:
        shape - The name of the Shape to get all build variations for.
        Returns:
        ReadOnlyIterator, an iterator of all builder variations for the given Shape name.

      • getBuilder

        public ShapeBuilder getBuilder(java.lang.String shape,
                               java.lang.String variation)
        Gets the builder for the given Shape name and variation name.
        Parameters:
        shape - The name of the Shape to get the builder for.
        variation - The name of the builder variation to get.
        Returns:
        ShapeBuilder, the builder associated with the given Shape and variation.

      • getShapes

        public ReadOnlyIterator<java.lang.String> getShapes()
        Gets an iterator of all the Shape names in this factory.
        Returns:
        ReadOnlyIterator, an iterator of all the Shape names in this factory.

      • getNumShapes

        public int getNumShapes()
        Gets the number of Shape names mapped by this factory.
        Returns:
        int, the number of Shape names mapped by this factory.

      • getNumVariations

        public int getNumVariations(java.lang.String shape)
        Gets the number of builder variations mapped by this factory for the given Shape name.
        Parameters:
        shape - The Shape name to get a variation count for.
        Returns:
        int, the number of builder variations mapped by this factory for the given Shape name.
